author: Xbox
description:
What's that sound? Your favorite game of gullets is out now on Xbox! 

You are the Esophaguys, old folks with elongating necks. Stretch, bite, and swing together in co-op, compete in mini games for long-necked glory, embark on a mythical story, and stretch your skills in a grueling hardcore mode. Featuring the world's first soundscape composed of twanging tones and elderly grunts. 

https://www.xbox.com/games/store/esophaguys/9P6901PZXC0T

author: Xbox
description:
A mother tells her child a twisted fairy tale about Goldman until delicate emotions from her own checkered past begin to resurface...

In this breathtaking platformer adventure, explore a vast hand-drawn Archipelago, inspired by ancient fables and depicted in classic frame-by-frame animation, and defeat a mysterious Deity.

The Eternal Life of Goldman is coming to PC and Xbox Series X|S! 

https://www.xbox.com/games/store/the-eternal-life-of-goldman/9p8crlxdgvsh

#TheEternalLifeOfGoldman

author: Xbox
description:
In Tides of Tomorrow, you’ll head out on a journey to find a cure for a fatal disease before everything is lost!

Every choice leaves a mark. Follow in the steps of a friend, a streamer or a total stranger and live the impacts of their decisions through your own story! And yes, you can also play solo, thanks to our offline journeys available at launch!

Tides of Tomorrow is coming to PC, PlayStation 5, and Xbox Series X|S on February 24, 2026.

#TidesOfTomorrow #THQNordic2025

https://www.xbox.com/games/store/tides-of-tomorrow/9nvsc8dxskrs

author: Xbox
description:
What shall we do with Flying Dutchman? 
The clash between King Neptune and the Flying Dutchman has unleashed ghostly mayhem across Bikini Bottom. By the power of BFFs, join SpongeBob and Patrick on their ghostliest adventure yet to once again save Bikini Bottom!

Pre-Order now and get the Natural Costume Pack for SpongeBob and Patrick!

SpongeBob SquarePants: Titans of the Tide is coming to Xbox Series X|S and PC on November 18th!

https://www.xbox.com/games/store/spongebob-squarepants-titans-of-the-tide/9NS8WJHD5MTW

description:
The boat offers little protection from the horrors ahead, but The Orphans are in it together whether they like it or not.

REANIMAL is the new game by Tarsier Studios, the original creators of Little Nightmares 1 & Little NIghtmares 2.

REANIMAL will come to PC and Xbox Series X|S.

author: Xbox
description:
Wage all-out war with infantry and vehicle combat, class-based squad play, and cutting-edge audiovisual immersion. Where Fighter Jets, Tanks, skydiving RPGS, Heavy Artillery, and high-intensity infantry combat become one. 

Demolish your surroundings for a strategic advantage with Tactical Destruction. Turn your vehicle into a wrecking ball, bury a squad under a ceiling, or create new paths to victory.

Battlefield’s new Kinesthetic Combat System makes you more connected to your soldier and environment than ever before. With overhauled gunplay and tactical movement, from crouch sprint to drag and revive, every shot and movement is more instinctual and precise.

Pre-Order Battlefield 6: https://www.xbox.com/games/store/battlefield-6/9NGCN2R5QB79
